org.smooks.engine.delivery.replay

Interface SAXEventReplay

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DOMBuilder, EndElementEvent, SaxNgHandler, SmooksContentHandler, StartElementEvent

    public interface SAXEventReplay
    SAX event replay interface.
    Author:
    tom.fennelly@gmail.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void replay(ContentHandler handler)
      Replay the last SAX event onto the supplied SAX ContentHandler instance.

    • Method Detail

      • replay

        void replay(ContentHandler handler)
     throws SmooksException
        Replay the last SAX event onto the supplied SAX ContentHandler instance.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler on whic to replay the last event.
        Throws:
        SmooksException - Error replaying last event.
